items.sentence: Tom and Mary sat the kitchen drinking tea and talking about their children.
Tom drove over the bridge, not knowing that it would be dangerous to do so.

It might end up being impossible to do, but we could at least try doing it.
This is how I've always done this, and I plan to keep on doing it this way.
A fact-finding committee was set up to determine the cause of the incident.
Let's decide what needs to be decided, then let's split into two teams, OK?
My favorite flowers are carnations, daffodils, chrysanthemums, and violets.
Many salesmen are smooth talkers, so I think you shouldn't trust them much.
Tom asked Mary to sell him the guitar she'd inherited from her grandfather.
As soon as it started raining, Tom realized he'd left his umbrella at home.

Tom apparently hasn't yet told Mary that he isn't going to be at her party.
Every time I think about what happened to Tom, I feel sad and start crying.

I see no reason that we have to wait until Tom gets here to start drinking.
Just because someone's smiling doesn't necessarily mean that they're happy.
Because of the traffic jam, it took us thirty minutes to cross that bridge.
